metadata.title: CVE-2022-23498 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Grafana is an open-source platform for monitoring and observability. Whendatasource query caching is enabled, Grafana caches all headers, including`grafana_session`. As a result, any user that queries a datasource wherethe caching is enabled can acquire another userâ€™s session. To mitigate thevulnerability you can disable datasource query caching for all datasources.This issue has been patched in versions 9.2.10 and 9.3.4.

criterions.comment: grafana package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
